urls.title: US corporations gave more than $8m to election deniers’ midterm campaigns
urls.description: Giant companies such as the AT&T, Home Depot and Boeing contributed to candidates who falsely claimed that Trump won in 2020

data.text: Some of the best-known corporations in the US, including @ATT, @Boeing, @Delta and the @HomeDepot, collectively poured more than $8m into supporting election deniers running for House and Senate seats in this month’s midterm elections. By @Edpilkington https://t.co/4GIT42PO7g

data.text: @Delta - what a pleasure to fly flight DL1642 (IAH - LGA), and to have the chance to meet Whitney the First Class Flight Attendant! I have questioned whether the legendary service I was used to from @Delta would ever be restored post 2020. Whitney restored my faith in @Delta
